name: Read API (api.php)

requests.name: Get entry by ID
requests.description: Fetch a database entry by ID with its attachments via the read-only API. Returns the entry data plus an attachments array with file_url for file-type attachments. Requires api_enabled=true and db_enabled=true in config/app.php. Clean URL alternative: <<baseURL>>api/entries/1

requests.name: Get entry by ID (POST body)
requests.description: Fetch a database entry by sending the ID in a JSON POST body. Alternative to GET /entries/{id}. Requires api_enabled=true and db_enabled=true. Clean URL alternative: <<baseURL>>api/entries

requests.name: Get entry by ID (with auth)
requests.description: Fetch a database entry by ID with Basic Auth. Requires api_enabled=true, db_enabled=true, and api_auth_enabled=true in config/app.php. Clean URL alternative: <<baseURL>>api/entries/1

requests.name: Download attachment file
requests.description: Download a file attachment by its attachment ID. Returns the file with correct Content-Type and Content-Disposition headers. Requires api_enabled=true, db_enabled=true, and storage_enabled=true. Clean URL alternative: <<baseURL>>api/files/1

requests.name: List reserved fields
requests.description: List all reserved underscore-prefixed control fields accepted by the webhook. Returns a JSON object with _version, optional _deploy_id, and a data array of field descriptors (name, type, description). Requires api_enabled=true. Does not require db_enabled or authentication. Clean URL alternative: <<baseURL>>api/fields

description: Read-only JSON API (api.php) â€” entry lookup, file download, and field metadata. All JSON responses include _version and optionally _deploy_id.
